org.forgerock.openam.license

Class ResourceLoaderLicenseLocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.license.ResourceLoaderLicenseLocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LicenseLocator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClasspathLicenseLocator, ServletContextLicenseLocator

    public abstract class ResourceLoaderLicenseLocator
extends Object
implements LicenseLocator
    Abstract base class for license locators that load the license from some resource location, such as classloaders and servlet contexts.
    Since:
    12.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ResourceLoaderLicenseLocator(Charset charset, String... licenseFiles)
      Constructs the license locator with the given license file names.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LicenseSet getRequiredLicenses()
      Gets a set of required licenses that must all be accepted by the user before the software can be installed/ upgraded.
      protected abstract InputStream getResourceAsStream(String resourceName)
      Load the given resource as an input stream.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResourceLoaderLicenseLocator

        protected ResourceLoaderLicenseLocator(Charset charset,
                                       String... licenseFiles)
        Constructs the license locator with the given license file names. Each file name given must exist on the system classpath.
        Parameters:
        charset - the character set to use when loading the license files.
        licenseFiles - the license files to load.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no license files are specified.
        NullPointerException - if the class loader is null.

    • Method Detail

      • getRequiredLicenses

        public LicenseSet getRequiredLicenses()
        Gets a set of required licenses that must all be accepted by the user before the software can be installed/ upgraded. All licenses in the set must be accepted before installation/upgrade can occur. Loads any required licenses from the classpath.
        Specified by:
        getRequiredLicenses in interface LicenseLocator
        Returns:
        the set of required licenses
        Throws:
        MissingLicenseException - if any of the required licenses cannot be found on the classpath or cannot be loaded for any reason.

      • getResourceAsStream

        protected abstract InputStream getResourceAsStream(String resourceName)
        Load the given resource as an input stream. Sub-classes should override this method to locate the actual resource. Returns null if the resource cannot be found.
        Parameters:
        resourceName - the resource to load.
        Returns:
        an input stream for the resource or null if not found.
